title: FREE RENT!! | Boutique apartment located in Koreatown!
posting_body: Welcome to 112 South Westmoreland!
Studio: 3D TOUR: <URL>
1 Bedroom: 3D TOUR: <URL>
**Advertised rent is net pricing of the unit when factoring in the move in special into the 12month lease.
Actual rent paid to landlord is $1595/month for studio, and $1,850/month for 1 bedroom.
STUDIO:
RENT: $1,595/month
DEPOSIT: $1,000 *OAC*
2ND MONTH FREE
1BEDROOM:
RENT: $1,850/month
DEPOSIT: $1,000 *OAC*
1/2 OF 2ND MONTH FREE
Experience one of the most exciting and centrally located neighborhoods at the residences at 112 South Westmoreland.
Our boutique apartment community is located in Koreatown, adjacent to Silverlake, Virgil Village, Echo Park and Downtown LA.
Some of the best restaurants, bars, parks and shopping that Los Angeles has to offer are all just minutes away.
Close proximity to A multitude of freeways makes it easy to commute to work and get to all the most trendy and desirable neighborhoods in LA.
There’s something for everyone at 112 South Westmoreland.
We offer a selection of renovated studio and one bedroom floor plans to offer you an ideal combination of refined style and quality.
Our warm and inviting homes feature hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, dishwashers, custom cabinetry, well-equipped kitchens, tiled bath and modern and chic fixtures and finishes.
Our apartments are sure to surpass your expectations!
From the moment you arrive, you’ll know you’ve come home.

The building has gone through extensive upgrades from the restoration of the beautiful brick facade, custom mahogany door, imported light fixtures, new stucco, new corridors and railings all designed to welcome you to your new home.
Delight in the beautiful new landscaping including a charming landscaped side yard lit up in the evenings with string lights.
Our on-call maintenance team and on-site manager are dedicated to providing excellent and efficient service when you need it.
Find your perfect home at 112 South Westmoreland.
This property is close to some fantastic restaurants, nightlife and shopping:
- Dining at the food hall at Platform 35 or at the many restaurants such as Beer Belly, Quarters, Silverlake Ramen or Here’s
Looking at You
- Cocktails at The Normandie Room, Paper Tiger, Bar Bandini, Bar Henry or Breakroom 86 at The Line
- Coffee at Valerie’s, Cafecito, Spl.
Coffee, URBAN Coffee House, Bloom & Plume and Lab Coffee Roasters
- Take in a show at The Wiltern or go sing your heart out at Gaam Karaoke
- Tons of fitness studios are nearby such as ROAM, Hot 8 Yoga, YogaWorks and Let’s Pilates
Our beautifully RENOVATED units with no detail overlooked include:
- hardwood floors
- stainless steel appliances
- dishwashers
- quartz countertops in kitchen and bath
- tiled showers
- large closets and ample storage in units
- modern fixtures and finishes
- in unit washer & dryer
Our boutique amenities include:
- secured access with intercom system
- pet friendly *small pets allowed with an additional $500 deposit and monthly pet rent $50/dog, $25/cat*
- new landscaping
- online rent payment
- professional management
Please call the onsite manager Eric
show contact info
for more information and to schedule your personal tour!
*EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY*
*PHOTOS MAY NOT REPRESENT ACTUAL UNIT FOR LEASE, PLEASE CONTACT THE ONSITE MANAGER DIRECTLY FOR MORE INFORMATION*
